ej,gereb001,M,muchm901,Obstruction call on Mark Ellis $Mark Ellis and Joey Gathright made contact when Ellis tried to field the ground ball; Ellis wanted interference but was called for obstructing Gathright; Oakland Manager Bob Geren ejected by 2B umpire Mike Muchlinski, who had made the call; rule 10.12(c) requires an error be charged on the play but that ruling was changed later in the game to a single, probably due to Ellis' 81-game errorless streak2007OAK.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,swisn001,P,meric901,Brawl after intentional HBP ej,padiv001,P,meric901,Brawl after intentional HBP $Nick Swisher, who had hit three homers in the past three games and had been hit in the previous game, charged the mound and tackled Vicente Padilla; both benches cleared; during the melee, 2B umpire Tim Timmons was knocked to the ground; both Swisher and Padilla were ejected by HP umpire Chuck Meriwether2007OAK.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
